question: Which of the following is a solution to the equation 2x - 3 = 9?

What is the value of tan(60°)?
What is the volume of a cone with radius 4 units and height 6 units? (Use π = 3.14)
What is the value of sin(45°)?

What is the equation of the circle with center (-2, 3) and radius 5?

If sin(A) = 0.6 and cos(A) = 0.8, what is the value of tan(A)?

What is the nth term of the arithmetic sequence: 3, 7, 11, 15, ...?
